title:
Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black,
Compatible Devices: Laptop, Desktop, Power Source: Corded Electric, Usb Cable, 3 AAA batteries required.
descriptions:
Hello, we are bringing for sell a product for your business. This product is a scanner for your shop or hotel. The name is "Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black." This scanner is made by ZEBRA company. 

This scanner, you can use without wires because it has batteries. It can work with 3 AAA batteries or you can use with electric from the wall or USB cable. You can connect this scanner with your laptop or desktop computer with the USB cable. It is very simple.

This scanner is special for reading codes, both the flat kind (1D) and the box kind (2D). When you scan your item, it can read from all directions. This is called omni-directional scanning. It is very good for fast work because you don't need to turn items around to scan.

The scanner is not heavy and is shaped to fit comfortably in your hand. We design it for long time use without tired. It is already set up for you to use easy when you get it. Also, it has a cradle where you can put the scanner when you not use it.

For your shop or hospitality business, this scanner is a good choice. It will help you to do your work fast and easy. Thank you for considering our product.

Hello, we have product for sale, it is very good for your shop or hospitality business. Name of product is "Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black." This product is from ZEBRA brand.

This scanner is good for work with laptop and desktop. You can use with corded electric, or with USB cable, or with 3 AAA batteries. This is very good because you can choose how to power it. It is using USB cable for connect.

It come with 3 batteries. Batteries are type AAA. This scanner can read codes 1D and 2D. It is good for use in many places like retail and hospitality because it is made for general purpose.

Scanner is easy to hold in hand because design is ergonomic and not heavy. It can scan in all directions, which is very helpful. It is ready to use from beginning, and it knows how to connect to many things without you tell it.

Features are many. It scan in all ways, has line to help aim, and it already set up for use. Also, it comes with cables that know how to connect to host.

Thank you for looking at our product. It will be good for your business.
